segments.text: How was your shopping trip Martin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually it was the most interesting day I ’ Ve had so far .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh really ? Did you find any bargains ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did ! I found this lovely teapot . It was the best one I saw in the shops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And how did you get around town ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took a taxi . It seemed the easiest thing to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , so you didn ’ t get lost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did actually but I think I met some of the friendliest people in China . They soon showed me the way !
segments.speaker: S2
